description: For a sneaker to join your lineup, it’s got to offer something groundbreaking. This lightweight sneaker’s elevated style will have you steady stepping without the sluggish bulk.
Handmade in Italy, Cagney Oxfords feel and fit will outdo any other shoe you will use in sheer style and comfiness. With proper maintenance, these shoes will last a mans lifetime.
Tilden Walk provides the most affordable price available for brown leather shoes, and quality is surprising. Qualifies for formal clothing.
A slip-resistant outsole keeps you safe on the jobsite, and the premium full-grain leather cleans up for the office.
The classic unisex design has never feeled better. The new Converse Chuck sports thicker insole and wing tongue stitching for maximum style and comfiness. No reason to wear them all day, every day!

Meet the ultimate Sunday sneaker. Its slip-on design and cushioned sole makes it perfect for relaxed days at home or on the go. Wear them with sweats, jeans, or anything, really. They are about to become your most versatile shoe.

Fischers wighly ventilated and stylized Chic-brands provide style and efficiency for indoor activities. White bottom provides extra cushioning and sharp edges for maximum friction, and all of it in a reasonable price!

Worked with finnish design and care for both men and women, Halti outdoor brands are fine tuned for nordic weather. Vada Ankle brand sports thinner layer and a sleeker design, forging a shoe more suitable for cities without sacrificing Haltis trademark recourcefulness.

Open your summer season with soft and comfy Platform sandals. Providing an extra layer of soft cork on the top and more stretchy soles, these sandals avoid extra friction towards the foot, enabling them for more chafable skin types.

This waterproof mens athletic shoe is slip and oil resistant with a rubber outsole. Featuring a non - metallic ASTM rated composite toe with leather and breathable mesh upper, the Eastfield is the perfect shoe for any off-the-bike activity.

Traditionally American design NB baseball shoes sport hard pressed metal plating bottoms providing unmatched friction and accuracy on weight control. Essential for any baseball player who takes himself even a little bit seriously. Put me in Coach, I am ready to play!
Classic Nike sportswear now upgraded with hit-nullifying bottom for better balance and weight control. If it is jogging, playing ball or working at the gym, nike is always dependable.

Light classic Nike running shoes for women specialized in running. Flex brand bottom is soft, flat and flexible, which assures superior weight-control on the bottom of the shoe, providing more forward motion on flat surface.

Old finnish classic Reino is an fabric built multi-layer freetime-shoe built to keep your feet warm during chilly wintertime. Reino are crafted with multiple layers of rubber and fabric, witch makes reinos flexible and breathes well. The Reino-team craft their shoes with no excess materials and ecologically, so worry not about the carbon footprint.

Specialized in light shoes and sandals, Rieker has a far-reaching knowledge on summerwear. These affordable sandals have firm straps that lock your feet firmly on the bottom, but lets your ankle to move freely.
Afordable athletic shoes for outside. With its light weight you will be sorry for using worse.

Truant-2 is a revamped classic truant, which is a combination of american moccasin and hi-top boot. This enables this warm shoe to resist more cold, water and snow. Lacing has also been modified to enable easier handling and more secure grip. Multipurposeful shoe indeed, that sates most of your needs!

In the truly high end, West Code 6066-G:s are the best casual shoes on the market. Consisting of thermoplastic rubber, these mens shoes have unrivaled heat resistance and flexibility while feeling light as a feather. Remember the maintenance and these shoes will carry you far and wide.
This neutral running shoe orthotic friendly and available in multiple widths. In this neutral running shoe, you will be flying from your first step to your last.
